#include<iostream>
#define MAX 1000000007
using namespace std;
inline void scanint(long long int* x)
{
	register char c = getchar_unlocked();
	*x = 0;
	for(; (c<48)||(c>57);c = getchar_unlocked());
	for(; (c>47)&&(c<58);c = getchar_unlocked())
		*x = (long long int)((((*x)<<1) + ((*x)<<3)) + c - 48);
}
inline void printint(long long int n)
{
	if(n == 0)
	{
		putchar_unlocked('0');
		putchar_unlocked('\n');
	}
	else
	{
		char buf[20];
		buf[19] = '\n';
		int i = 18;
		while(n)
		{
			buf[i--] = n % 10 + '0';
			n /= 10;
		}
		while(buf[i] != '\n')
			putchar_unlocked(buf[++i]);
	}	
}
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while (t--)
	{
		long long int n, year;
		//int year;
		int curr=2000;
		scanint(&n);
		scanint(&year);
		while (curr++ != year)
		{
			n=(n*n)%MAX;
			
			
		}
		printint(n%MAX);
		cout<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
